pros: Supportive class that is important for bossing
Lots of useful utility such as curing abnormal statuses, increasing EXP gained, and preventing KO
Has an ability to create a portal to the nearest town for convenience with Mystic Door
Buffs last for a long time because of passive increased buff duration
cons: Teleport Mastery will trigger Damage Reflect
Need to remember to toggle Magic Guard

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, Holy Symbol - Item Drop, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +30%] [ +40%] [ +5% when wand is equipped]
Damage: [ up to +40%] [ +40% while inactive]
Final Damage: [ +3% for each party member up to +15%] [ +10% from debuff] [ +40% from debuff for holy attacks] [ +30% while active]
Attack Speed (Weapon): 3 [ -1 while active]
Ignore DEF: [ +20%] [ up to +40% from debuff]
Ignore Elemental Resistance: [ +10% while active]
EXP Rate (From Monsters): [ +50%] [ +20% for each Bishop up to +60%]

buffInfo.active: (Toggle), , , (Toggle), , , (Toggle)
buffInfo.summons: , (87 - 60s cd), , (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (405 - 180s cd), (90s cd), (180s cd), (90s cd), (120s cd), (180s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (59 - 30s cd), (180s cd), (60s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (90s cd, blocks 1 death), (60 - 53s cd)

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Magician, intelligent and magical' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Magician, talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'Path of the Cleric'. Completing the quest will make you a Cleric and you will be on the path to a Bishop. Cleric is the 2nd job of Bishop

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Holy Symbol - Item Drop
  • Advanced Blessing - Ferocity and Boss Rush
  • Holy Magic Shell - Persist

extraContent.title: Bahamut
extraContent.content:
In 4th Job, you gain the summon Bahamut which debuffs enemies causing enemies to take increased %Final Damage from Holy-attributed attacks and consume the debuff

Below is a list of skills that have a Holy-attribute:

  • Holy Arrow (2nd Job)
  • Heal (2nd Job) - Damages Undead-type enemies
  • Shining Ray (3rd Job)
  • Angel Ray (4th Job)
  • Big Bang (4th Job)
  • Bahamut (4th Job)
  • Angel of Balance (5th Job)
  • Divine Charge (Paladin 4th Job)
  • Heaven's Hammer (Paladin 4th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 309%, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 170, and up and down with 275
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +100

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Holy Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 518%, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Cast a ray of holy magic forward
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.name: Blessed Ensemble
primary.shortDesc: Including yourself, increases final damage by 2% in proportion to the number of nearby party members you have buffed. 20% bonus EXP fo each Cleric in the party.
primary.desc: Increases your %Final Damage for every nearby party member you have buffed
details: Grants increased %EXP from enemies for each Cleric in your party (up to 60%)

primary.name: Heal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Recovery: 300%, Heal's Cooldown per Party Member Healed: -2 sec, Duration: 2 sec, Max Number of Nearby Monsters: 6, Final Damage: +10%, Max Number of Undead Monsters: 6, Damage: 410%\nCooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: Heals nearby party members and debuffs nearby enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage
Deals damage to Undead type monsters
Cooldown is reduced based on the number of members in your party

primary.name: Bless
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Attack Power: +15, Magic ATT: +15, DEF: +300, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Magic Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Weapon's Attack Speed increased for 240 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of the enemy's Max MP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Does not apply to bosses

primary.name: Invincible
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -25%

primary.name: Shining Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 254%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 60%, Stun Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: Shines a ray of light that damages nearby enemies and has a chance to stun
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.name: Holy Fountain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, restores 40% HP when used, able to use 20 times total. Duration: 60 sec. Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Creates a fountain which party members can press the Up Arrow Key to restore some %Max HP
details: Has a fixed number of uses before the fountain disappears
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Divine Protection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, resist critical Abnormal Status once.\nCooldown: 180 sec\n[Passive Effect: Increases Abnormal Status and all Elemental Resistance by 40]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Abnormal Status (Debuff)
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Cooldown is reduced for each party member cured by Dispel

primary.name: Mystic Door
primary.shortDesc: MP 60, Portal Duration: 200 sec
primary.desc: Creates a portal that leads to the nearest town for your party members
details: To use, press the Up Arrow Key

primary.name: Dispel
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, after nullifying magic and curing Abnormal Status at 100% chance, Dispel's cooldown reduced by 4 sec and\nDivine Protection's cooldown reduced by 60 sec for each party member cured\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Cures party members of Abnormal Statuses
details: If a party member is cured, the cooldown of Dispel and are reduced

primary.name: Holy Symbol
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, EXP Bonus: 50%, Duration: 240 sec
primary.desc: Increases the amount of EXP gained from enemies for all party members nearby
details: If party members go too far, the effects of Holy Symbol are reduced

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 340%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4 sec, Teleport Distance: +20
primary.desc: When toggled, using will damage nearby enemies
details: Has a chance to stun enemies
Permanently increases the teleport distance

primary.name: Holy Magic Shell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, base HP Recovered: 100%, Duration: 15 sec, Max Number of Attacks Blocked: 15, Damage: -10% for attacks that do a certain percentage of your Max HP.\nCannot trigger Holy Magic for 80 sec  Cooldown: 90 sec.
primary.desc: Restores the HP of nearby party members and grants them a shield
details:
The shield will absorb a set number of attacks before disappearing
  • If the attack was a %Max HP attack, you will take reduced damage instead
After receiving a Holy Magic Shell, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +13%

primary.name: Holy Focus
primary.shortDesc: For all attacks and the Heal skill, Critical Rate: +40%, Magic Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Angel Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 7. Restores 20% of your Max HP for you and your party members.
primary.desc: Fires a piercing holy arrow forward that damages enemies and heals party members it passes through
details: Party members with the 'Undead' debuff will also be healed

primary.name: Genesis
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 405%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 12, Crit Rate: +20%, Cooldown: 45 sec
primary.desc: Creates rays of holy light that strike from above
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Big Bang
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 480%, Number of Attacks: 4, Successfully hit enemy's Defense: -10%, Duration: 15 sec, can be stacked up to 4 time(s).
primary.desc: Releases a holy explosion around you that damages and debuffs nearby enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Decreases %DEF
  • Can stack up to 4 times

primary.name: Blessed Harmony
primary.shortDesc: The final damage increases by 3% for each party member that received the buff
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack

primary.name: Resurrection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150. Revives all KO'd party members within range and grants you invincibility for 3 sec. Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Revives all party members within range
details:
Revived party members are briefly invincible and gain increased %Damage
  • For every 2500 INT, the damage increase is stronger (up to 25%)
  • You will also gain the %Damage increase however, not the invincibility
Still consumes a Death Count for bosses even if revived but buffs are kept
Not affected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Increases final damage of Magic ATT by 70%.
Periodically recovers base HP and MP by 10% and increases final damage of Magic ATT by 3%.
Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Knockback Resistance: +70%, Duration: 40 sec, Cooldown: 3 min
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Knockback Resistance and %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Bahamut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Bahamut Summon Duration: 260 sec, Damage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 3\nEnemies attacked will be marked with Bahamut's insignia for 60 seconds, and when they are attacked with a Holy attack, the insignia will disappear and final damage will increase by 25%
primary.desc: Summons a dragon to attack nearby enemies while debuffing them
details: [Debuff]: Holy-attribute attacks deal increased %Final Damage and consume the debuff
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Blessing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 52, Attack Power: +30, Magic ATT: +30, DEF: +550, Max HP: +750, Max MP: +750, MP Consumption: -20%, Duration: 240 sec
details: Does not stack with

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increased Magic ATT: +30, Buff Duration: +50%

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Aside from minions' attacks, damage will increase by 8% for 5 sec at a 80% chance when the attack hits. Accumulates up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Damaging an enemy has a chance to grant a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

hyperPassive.name: Holy Magic Shell - Enhance
details: Includes %Max HP attacks

hyperPassive.name: Holy Symbol - Preparation
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance and Elemental Resistance: +10%\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%]

hyperActive.name: Righteously Indignant
hyperActive.shortDesc:
[While Inactive] Damage: +40%
[While Active] MP Cost: 100, Magic ATT: +50, Final Damage: +30%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +20%, Attack Speed: +1,
Elemental Resistance: -10%. Reduces Recovery Amount to 40% of the normal amount.
Angel Ray Attack Count: +7, Max Enemies Hit by Angel Ray reduced to 1.
Cooldown: 1 sec.
details:
[When Active]: Increases %Final Damage, %Ignore DEF, Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and %Elemental Resistance and grants flat Magic Attack
  • also gains additional hits per attack
  • However, you have reduced Recovery Amount and can only hit one enemy
[When Inactive]: You gain increased %Damage

hyperActive.name: Heaven's Door
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 8, Protects party members from one KO.\nCooldown: 90 sec\nParty members that receive Heaven's Door cannot receive it again for 600 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Damages nearby enemies while granting a buff to nearby party members
details: [Buff]: Protects allies from one KO
After receiving a Heaven's Door's buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Benediction
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 42 sec, Final Damage (all party members in range): +5%
Party members other than yourself periodically recover 1% of max HP/MP, clear certain statuses, and have their Attack Speed increased.
Final Damage: +1% per 2500 INT (up to +40% max)
HP/MP Recovery: +1% per 2000 INT (up to +10% max)
Attack Speed: +1 per 10000 INT (up to +3 max)
Can be toggled
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an aura around your character where party members inside it gain a buff
details: [Buff]: Party members other than yourself gain increases %Final Damage and Attack Speed while periodically restoring %Max HP/MP and clearing certain Abnormal Statuses

Effects scale off of your INT stat:
  • [Final Damage]: +1% for every 2500 INT (up to +40%)
  • [HP/MP Recovery]: +1% for every 2000 INT (up to +10%)
  • [Attack Speed]: +1% for every 10000 INT (up to +3)

fifthMain.name: Angel of Balance
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 30 sec. The angel's aspect depends upon whether Righteously Indignant is active or inactive.
Inactive: Appears as the Angel of Benevolence. Grants a buff that recovers 15% of party members' Max HP every 5 sec and increases their damage by 5% and 1% per 1250 INT for 4 sec. Damage can increase up to 100%.
Active: Appears as the Avenging Angel. Attacks up to 12 enemies dealing 1000% damage 12 times. Attacked enemies are marked for 60 sec. Dealing holy damage to those enemies consumes the mark and increases Final Damage of the attack by 50%.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons an angel to fight by your side
details: Cannot be summoned while is active
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

[ is active]: Appears as Avenging Angel, attacks nearby enemies and debuffs them
  • [Debuff]: Holy-attribute attacks deal increased %Final Damage and consume the debuff
  • Ignores the max enemy limit from Righteously Indignant

[ is inactive]: Appears as Angel of Benevolence, granting a buff that periodically restores %Max HP to nearby party members and increases their %Damage
  • Damage increase scales off of your INT stat, +1% for every 1250 INT (up to +100%)

fifthMain.name: Peacemaker
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, deals 700% damage to up to 6 enemies 4 time(s) at every interval, or restores 40% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object.
Max Contact Count: 12. Both attacks and recovery consume the contact count.
Holy Light: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 12. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by 10% for 8 sec, while also increasing 1% for each remaining contact.
Cooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Sends an angel forward that damages enemies and heals party members it passes through
details:
At the end of its range, the angel lingers dealing damage and buffing party members
  • [Buff]: Increases %Damage
  • Pressing the Skill Key again will cause the angel to disappear
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Divine Punishment
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Attack: 40, Consumes 1 holy light per sec.
Attacks up to 6 enemies to the front, for 450% damage, 5 times. While Righteously Indignant is active, increases the number of attacks by 5..
1 holy light is prepared every 8.5 sec, and you can hold up to 8 at a time.
Cooldown: 1.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Rains down angelic arrows from above
details:
This skill has a special resource called Divine Light which are prepared every 8.5 seconds and you can hold up to 8 at a time
  • Costs 1 Divine Light per second to cast
Deals increased number of hits per attack if is active

meta: Bishop is INT mage class part of the Explorers class group. Bishop is known for their incredible support potential
